code:
sequenceDiagram participant Admin as Usuário (Admin) participant Exporter as Sults_Copy_Exporter participant Extractor as Sults_Copy_Extractor participant ImgProc as Processador de Imagens participant JSP as Extractor_JSP participant Zip as ZipArchive (PHP) Admin->>Exporter: Clica em "Gerar JSP (Exportar)" Exporter->>Extractor: get_clean_html($post_id) rect rgb(240, 240, 240) note right of Extractor: Pipeline de Limpeza Extractor->>Extractor: Raw -> Cleaner -> Improver end Extractor-->>Exporter: Retorna HTML Limpo Exporter->>ImgProc: process_images_in_html($html) note right of ImgProc: Renomeia src para relativo e
gera lista de arquivos físicos ImgProc-->>Exporter: Retorna HTML Ajustado + Lista de Arquivos Exporter->>JSP: convert_to_jsp($html_ajustado) JSP-->>Exporter: Retorna String JSP Completa Exporter->>Zip: Cria .zip temporário Zip->>Zip: Adiciona .jsp Zip->>Zip: Adiciona imagens da Lista Exporter-->>Admin: Download do Arquivo .zip Exporter->>Exporter: Deleta arquivo temporário (unlink)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
